title: Migrate Players to a New Server
description: A game is retiring an old server and needs to migrate all players and their data to a new, more powerful server.

tasks.description: Place the old server in 'maintenance mode' to prevent new logins.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully puts the old server in maintenance.

tasks.description: Create a complete backup of the old server's player database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a full data backup.

tasks.description: Restore the backup onto the new server.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully restores all player data to the new server.

tasks.description: Update the game's server list to point players to the new server's IP address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the configuration so players will connect to the new server.
